analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable._transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol#63-64) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_path' of IndTokenPayment. (/unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol#197) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_path' of IndTokenPayment.setConversionPath (/unique_contracts/0x5805b8c8d2363384b031537ee2f10216ff1684b3.sol#207-209) is not in mixedCase
